title: The Lighthouse
review: I didn't think I would ever want to see this again, but I had the urge. I was compelled to gaze upon the forbidden sight. It's great and I think I liked it a little more this time. The sound design is fantastic and obviously the performances are special. I have given it a little shock rating this time as I think the way it cuts to horrible things is at least a non-zero amount of shockingness. The fall when paining is shocking too.
